pr_title: Align parser for swan lake object changes

timeline.message: Align parser with new parser rules for object type

timeline.bodyText: getErrorCode(Syntaxkind expectedKind) will be removed soon. There is a new method introduced getErrorCode(ParserRuleContext currentCtx) Please add all new contexts which u introduce to that method as u add in getExpectedToken in ErrorHandler.
timeline.author: rdulmina

replies.bodyText: I see. class-change branch haven't synced with this change from master it seems. Will fix once synced. Thanks!
replies.author: lochana-chathura

replies.bodyText: @rdulmina Shall we remove that getErrorCode(Syntaxkind expectedKind) soon?
replies.author: SupunS

replies.bodyText: @SupunS sure. Here is the issue created #25611
replies.author: rdulmina

replies.bodyText: @rdulmina added to getErrorCode(ParserRuleContext currentCtx) with b3b7d5b in PR #25623
replies.author: lochana-chathura

timeline.message: Align valid syntax tests for new object type rules
Add object-constructor-expr error recovery test cases
Align recovery tests for new error recovery rules

migrate annon objects to classes/obj ctor

If we did support object closures then we would have
migrated all of this to object constructor expressions.

Merge branch 'class-change' of https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang into obect-parsing

timeline.bodyText: Should we rename this to ERROR_DUPLICATE_CLASS_TYPE_QUALIFIER? it seems consistent with the rest.
timeline.author: SupunS

timeline.bodyText: Lets see if we can remove this
timeline.author: SupunS

replies.bodyText: yah. Haven't pushed the commit with code review suggestions yet.
replies.author: lochana-chathura

timeline.bodyText: Lets remove these invalid tests. May be we can keep one or two as negative test cases.
timeline.author: SupunS

timeline.message:
Add code review suggestions

Use aliasing for object-member context
Use context when parsing object members instead of two flags
Allow parsing type inclusion and then log an error
Allow parsing old object type qualifiers and then log an error
Remove invalid object type parser tests
Fix client object type parsing at top level

Merge branch 'class-change' of https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang into obect-parsing
